sn47.11:4.2: Atha kho āyasmā sāriputto yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami;
sn47.11:4.4: Ekamantaṃ nisinno kho* āyasmā sāriputto bhagavantaṃ etadavoca:
sn47.11:4.6: Kittāvatā nu kho, bhante, mahāpuriso hotī”ti?
sn47.11:5.2: Idha, sāriputta, bhikkhu kāye kāyānupassī viharati ātāpī sampajāno satimā, vineyya loke abhijjhādomanassaṃ.
sn47.11:5.3: Tassa kāye kāyānupassino viharato cittaṃ virajjati, vimuccati anupādāya āsavehi.
sn47.11:5.6: dhammesu dhammānupassī viharati ātāpī sampajāno satimā, vineyya loke abhijjhādomanassaṃ.
sn47.11:5.7: Tassa dhammesu dhammānupassino viharato cittaṃ virajjati, vimuccati anupādāya āsavehi.
